{"id":1081000709,"question_id":3186,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"8Â months, 1Â week","timestamp":1697943098,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1081000709/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Sum of Mountain Triplets II","memory":"55.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minimumSum(int[] nums) {\n        int min = nums[0];\n        int min2[] = new int[nums.length];\n        int res = -1;\n        min2[nums.length-1] = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        for(int i=nums.length-2;i>=0;i--){\n            min2[i] = Math.min(min2[i+1], nums[i+1]);\n        }\n        for(int j=1;j<nums.length-1;j++){\n            min = Math.min(min, nums[j-1]);\n            if(min2[j] >= nums[j] || min >=nums[j]){\n                continue;\n            }\n            if(res == -1){\n                // System.out.println(\"j=\"+j+\" res = \"+res+\" min = \"+min+\" min2 = \"+min2[j]);\n                res = min+min2[j]+nums[j];\n            }\n            else{\n                // System.out.println(\"j=\"+j+\" res = \"+res+\" min = \"+min+\" min2 = \"+min2[j]);\n                res = Math.min(res, min+min2[j]+nums[j]);\n            }\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-sum-of-mountain-triplets-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
